stages.logText: I met old man Bogsten in his cabin. He was sick after encountering a giant mushroom and wanted me to go see the potion merchant in Fallhaven to get a cure.
The potion merchant needed four spore samples to prepare the cure. I should go back to see Bogsten.
Bogsten gave me the key to his backyard. I should go to the mushroom cave from there and collect the spore samples.
I opened Bogsten's backyard door.
I showed Bogsten the spores. Now I should go back to see the potion merchant.
The potion merchant gave me the cure. I could give it to Bogsten now.
Bogsten got cured.
But he said the evil forces in his cave was preventing him from working. He asked me to check his cave and gave me his necklace.

I met an old sorcerer named Zuul'khan in the cave. He told me Bogsten's family imprisoned him using an ancient petrifying spell, but thanks to Bogsten's laxity, he was now free. He wanted me to kill Bogsten and bring him Bogsten's staff.
I decided to slay Zuul'khan.
I defeated Zuul'khan, but he was not dead. He disappeared into the ground. I should tell Bogsten about what happened.
Bogsten then remembered the petrifying spell. This time he would make sure that Zuul'khan cannot come back. He gave me a bag of mushrooms and told me I should bring them to the potion merchant.
Zuul'khan seemed to have moved away from the Bogsten's caves to another hiding.
The potion merchant said that these were very rare mushrooms. He prepared two "Underground Fighter" potions for me. He would sell me some more if I came back.
Zuul'khan's offer seemed interesting. I have to go kill Bogsten.
I decided to keep Bogsten's staff for myself, so I had to kill Zuul'khan.
I defeated Zuul'khan, but he was not dead. He disappeared into the ground.
I gave Bogsten's staff to Zuul'khan.
He rewarded me with permanent immunity to Spore Infection.
10=Chains.

60=Cave wall open
I heard rumours of a giant snake to the south of Fallhaven.
Bela was happy that I freed Fallhaven of the threat of this monstrous snake.
Mikhail gave me a book in which I could put down my most unusual experiences and achievements.
My first glance on the great Duleian Road!
Swimming along a raging river - done
